00039 #include "c6x.h"
00040 #include "memory.h"
00041 #ifdef _OPENMP
00042 #include <ti/omp/omp.h>
00043 #include <ti/omp/libgomp_g.h>
00044 #endif
00045 
00046 Ptr Memory_allocMSMC(SizeT size, SizeT align)
00047 {
00048   IHeap_Handle heap;
00049   int coreId;
00050 
00051 #ifdef _OPENMP
00052   coreId = omp_get_thread_num();
00053 #else
00054   coreId = 0;
00055 #endif
00056 
00057   switch(coreId)
00058   {
00059   case 0:
00060         heap = (IHeap_Handle) msmcHeap0;
00061         break;
00062   case 1:
00063         heap = (IHeap_Handle) msmcHeap1;
00064         break;
00065   case 2:
00066         heap = (IHeap_Handle) msmcHeap2;
00067         break;
00068   case 3:
00069         heap = (IHeap_Handle) msmcHeap3;
00070         break;
00071   case 4:
00072         heap = (IHeap_Handle) msmcHeap4;
00073         break;
00074   case 5:
00075         heap = (IHeap_Handle) msmcHeap5;
00076         break;
00077   case 6:
00078         heap = (IHeap_Handle) msmcHeap6;
00079         break;
00080   case 7:
00081         heap = (IHeap_Handle) msmcHeap7 ;
00082         break;
00083   default:
00084         heap = (IHeap_Handle) msmcHeap0;
00085         break;
00086   }
00087   return Memory_alloc(heap, size, align, NULL);
00088 }
00089 
00090 Void Memory_freeMSMC(Ptr block, SizeT size)
00091 {
00092   IHeap_Handle heap;
00093   int coreId;
00094 
00095 #ifdef _OPENMP
00096   coreId = omp_get_thread_num();
00097 #else
00098   coreId = 0;
00099 #endif
00100 
00101   switch(coreId)
00102   {
00103   case 0:
00104         heap = (IHeap_Handle) msmcHeap0;
00105         break;
00106   case 1:
00107         heap = (IHeap_Handle) msmcHeap1;
00108         break;
00109   case 2:
00110         heap = (IHeap_Handle) msmcHeap2;
00111         break;
00112   case 3:
00113         heap = (IHeap_Handle) msmcHeap3;
00114         break;
00115   case 4:
00116         heap = (IHeap_Handle) msmcHeap4;
00117         break;
00118   case 5:
00119         heap = (IHeap_Handle) msmcHeap5;
00120         break;
00121   case 6:
00122         heap = (IHeap_Handle) msmcHeap6;
00123         break;
00124   case 7:
00125         heap = (IHeap_Handle) msmcHeap7 ;
00126         break;
00127   default:
00128         heap = (IHeap_Handle) msmcHeap0;
00129         break;
00130   }
00131   Memory_free(heap, block, size);
00132 
00133 }
